Name: Manual_WatchAShow_Chakraa
description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

2.0.description:
- Added support to have a custom amount of episodes between 1 and 20
- Final location in logic after all episodes have been received
- Made each episode grant 4 items instead of 2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/1.0...2.0
2.0.title: 2.0 - Custom Episode Amount with True/False

2025.07.31.description:
* Extended the maximum amount of locations per episodes from 4 to 10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/4.1...2025.07.31
2025.07.31.title: 2025.07.31 - Extend locations per Episodes

2025.09.01.description:
* UPDATED: Leading Zeros in front of single digit Location/Item names to have a better ordering in the tracker

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/2025.08.13...2025.09.01
2025.09.01.title: 2025.09.01 - Leading Zeros

2025.09.03.description:
* ADDED: Possibility to have up to 200 Episodes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/2025.09.01...2025.09.03
2025.09.03.title: 2025.09.03 - Episodes 101-200

3.0.description:
* You can now select how many episodes you want in the YAML (from 1 to 50) as a numeral, you no longer have to set each episode you want to "true"
* The appropriate items/locations will be added to the run
* Modified the Categories to make it a bit cleaner in the Manual Client

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/2.0...3.0
3.0.title: 3.0 - Custom Episode Amount (Range)

4.0.description:
- Added the option to choose between watching the episodes in sequential order or in chaotic order
- Added more episodes up to 100
- Added the option to choose the amount of checks sent per episode, between 1 and 4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-WatchAShow/compare/3.0...4.0
4.0.title: 4.0 - Chaotic Order & Locations

4.1.description:
Update to the latest Manual Release to ensure the correct tracking goal and other dependencies
